channel.title: Axoloti patcher memory usage in ubuntu
channel.description: Hi, i'd like to report an issue i'm having: each time i work on a fairly complex patch i get a warning notice about hard disk space in my root folder running out. I'm aware that this might be due to several factors, however the strange thing i noticed is that in 30 minutes the free space went from 900 MB to 400 MB, no software updates running, just the axoloti patcher

item.title: Axoloti patcher memory usage in ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @alex alex
item.source: Axoloti patcher memory usage in ubuntu

@Sputnki wrote:

Hi, i'd like to report an issue i'm having: each time i work on a fairly complex patch i get a warning notice about hard disk space in my root folder running out.
I'm aware that this might be due to several factors, however the strange thing i noticed is that in 30 minutes the free space went from 900 MB to 400 MB, no software updates running, just the axoloti patcher
